pages.title: Sapphire
pages.text: Corundum gems, or Sapphires, can have lots of different colors. However the blue one will always be step above in beauty. A natural conduit of mana, particularly attuned to the water and the sea.
Sapphire can be found in the Overworld between Y level -64 and 16, in decent-sized clusters that tend to be higher or bigger clusters that tend to be deeper and not exposed to air.
